results.content: Spring MVC course is so good, I learnt a lot. But the Spring Boot is not friendly to new learners like me. LOL.

results.content:
The spring part was a disaster: outdated and the ide used is eclipse, really?!
The springboot part is average so far, and is also outdated: the remote shell library does not work with the latest springboot version anymore
